designSystem.name: Modern Dating App Design System
designSystem.description: A modern, mobile-first design system inspired by contemporary dating apps. Features light backgrounds, blue primary accents, gradient buttons, colorful icons, and engaging visual elements optimized for mobile experiences.

designPrinciples.engagement: Design should be visually engaging and encourage user interaction. Use colors, gradients, and icons to create an appealing experience.
designPrinciples.mobileFirst: Every component is designed for mobile devices first, with touch-friendly targets and mobile-optimized spacing.
designPrinciples.clarity: Information hierarchy should be clear and scannable. Important actions and content should stand out.
designPrinciples.consistency: Reusable components maintain visual consistency across the application while allowing for contextual variations.
designPrinciples.accessibility: High contrast ratios, clear typography hierarchy, and touch-friendly interactive elements (minimum 44x44px).
designPrinciples.modernity: Contemporary design with rounded corners, smooth gradients, colorful accents, and fluid interactions.

light.description: Light theme is the default - white/light backgrounds with dark text

dark.description: Dark theme variant - dark backgrounds with light text (optional support)

ui.description: Blue primary UI accent - used for selected states, progress bars, verified badges, active tabs, and primary interactive elements
ui.usage: Selected tabs, progress bars, verified checkmarks, active states, primary buttons, links

light.description: White background for light theme - main canvas color
light.usage: Primary background for pages, screens, and main content areas in light theme

dark.description: Dark gray background for dark theme
dark.usage: Primary background for pages in dark theme

blueToOrange.description: Blue to orange gradient for special action buttons and premium features
blueToOrange.usage: Gradient buttons for special actions (e.g., 'Add more to my gender'), premium feature highlights

woman.description: Pink color for woman/female gender option
woman.usage: Gender selection radio buttons, gender-specific UI elements

man.description: Blue color for man/male gender option
man.usage: Gender selection radio buttons, gender-specific UI elements

nonBinary.description: Green color for non-binary/other gender option
nonBinary.usage: Gender selection radio buttons, gender-specific UI elements

blue.description: Blue for premium features (e.g., MoonitX with crown icon)
blue.usage: Premium feature cards, upgrade buttons, premium badges

yellow.description: Yellow/gold for premium gifts/features (e.g., Gift with diamond icon)
yellow.usage: Gift features, special offers, premium highlights

orange.description: Orange for boost features (e.g., Boosts with rocket icon)
orange.usage: Boost features, promotional elements, action highlights

white.description: Pure white for card backgrounds and content containers
white.usage: Card backgrounds, modal backgrounds, input fields, surfaces

black.description: Pure black for primary text and high-contrast elements
black.usage: Main headings, body text, important labels

light.description: Very light gray for subtle backgrounds and dividers

border.description: Light gray for borders and separators
border.usage: Card borders, input borders, dividers, disabled states

medium.description: Medium gray for secondary text and inactive elements
medium.usage: Secondary text, placeholder text, inactive tabs, metadata

dark.description: Dark gray for tertiary text and subtle emphasis

success.description: Green for success states and positive confirmations
success.usage: Success messages, confirmation indicators, positive actions

error.description: Red for errors, destructive actions, and deny buttons
error.usage: Error messages, destructive actions, deny buttons, validation errors

warning.description: Orange/amber for warnings and caution states

info.description: Blue for informational messages (same as primary UI)
info.usage: Info messages, informational badges, neutral actions

fontFamily.primary: Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif
fontFamily.description: Modern, clean sans-serif font family. Inter is preferred for its excellent readability and modern aesthetic on mobile devices.

display.usage: Large profile names, major headings, hero text, app titles

heading1.usage: Page titles, card titles, section headings, form titles

heading2.usage: Subsection headings, card subtitles, step indicators

heading3.usage: Smaller headings, list item titles, feature names

body.usage: Body text, descriptions, general content, form labels

bodySmall.usage: Secondary text, metadata, timestamps, helper text, step numbers

caption.usage: Labels, captions, helper text, filter tags

hierarchy.primary: Use display or heading1 for the most important information (e.g., user names, page titles, major headings)
hierarchy.secondary: Use heading2 or heading3 for supporting information (e.g., section headers, feature names, step labels)
hierarchy.tertiary: Use body or bodySmall for descriptions and general content
hierarchy.metadata: Use caption or bodySmall for timestamps, labels, step numbers, and less important information

borderRadius.description: Rounded corners are essential. Cards use 'lg' (0.75rem), buttons use 'md' (0.5rem), avatars and circular buttons use 'full', filter tags use 'full'.

shadows.description: Subtle shadows for depth. Cards use 'md' shadow. Premium features may use 'lg' for emphasis.

card.description: Primary container component for all content sections

variants.premium: Colored background (blue, yellow, or orange) with icon, for premium features

layout.spacing: Maintain 1rem gap between cards on mobile, 1.5rem on larger screens
layout.padding: Always use 1.5rem internal padding for card content

button.description: Interactive action elements with clear visual hierarchy

primary.description: Blue primary button for main actions
primary.usage: Primary actions, confirm buttons, main CTAs

secondary.usage: Secondary actions, cancel buttons, less important actions

gradient.description: Blue to orange gradient button for special actions
gradient.usage: Special actions (e.g., 'Add more to my gender'), premium features, highlights

text.usage: Edit profile, view all, subtle actions

circular.description: Circular black button for navigation (e.g., next/previous arrows)

states.hover: Slightly darker shade of base color, slight scale (1.02)
states.disabled: Reduced opacity (0.5) and no pointer events

withIcon.description: Buttons can include icons (left, right, or both sides)

progressIndicator.description: Progress indicators showing completion or steps

linear.description: Horizontal progress bar for step indicators and completion
linear.usage: Onboarding steps (e.g., 'STEP 2 OF 8'), profile completion, loading states

stepIndicator.description: Text indicator showing current step (e.g., 'STEP 2 OF 8')

radioButton.description: Radio button with icon support for gender selection and options

selected.borderColor: varies by option (pink, blue, or green)

tab.description: Tab navigation component for switching between views

filterTag.description: Small rounded filter buttons (e.g., 'Nearby', 'Has a Bio', 'Photo Verified')

bottomNavigation.description: Fixed bottom navigation bar with icons

premiumFeatureCard.description: Colored card for premium features (MoonitX, Gift, Boosts)

badge.description: Small colored pills for labels, counts, and status indicators

input.description: Form input fields and text areas

grid.description: Responsive grid system for card layouts

bottomNavigation.description: Fixed bottom navigation bar with safe area support

hover.description: Subtle hover effects on interactive elements

active.description: Pressed state for buttons and interactive elements

onboarding.structure: Progress bar (top) → Step indicator text → Main heading → Content → Navigation buttons (bottom)
onboarding.spacing: Progress: top margin, Step indicator: 0.5rem below progress, Heading: 1rem below step, Content: 1.5rem below heading, Navigation: fixed bottom

profileCard.structure: Avatar (large, centered) → Name with verified badge → Description → Tags (badges) → Action buttons
profileCard.spacing: Avatar: 1rem bottom margin, Name: 0.5rem bottom margin, Tags: 1rem top margin with 0.5rem gap between

premiumFeature.spacing: Icon: 1rem right margin, Content: flex-1, Action: left margin

contrast.minimum: 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text
contrast.description: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA contrast requirements

touchTargets.description: All interactive elements should be at least 44x44 pixels for comfortable touch interaction

focus.visible: All interactive elements must have visible focus states

guidelines.useTailwind: Prefer Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling. Extend tailwind.config.js with custom colors and spacing from this design system.
guidelines.componentStructure: Create reusable components for each UI element (Card, Button, Avatar, etc.) that follow these specifications.
guidelines.responsiveDesign: All components should be mobile-first and responsive using the grid breakpoints defined above.
guidelines.consistency: Always use the spacing scale, color palette, and typography scale defined here. Avoid arbitrary values.
guidelines.stateManagement: Ensure all interactive elements have hover, active, focus, and disabled states as specified.
guidelines.themeSupport: Default to light theme. Dark theme support is optional but should follow the same design principles.

tailwindMapping.spacing: Use Tailwind's spacing scale (p-4 = 1rem, p-6 = 1.5rem, etc.)
